00101 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00102 #include "config.h"

00106 #include "shell.h"
00107 #include "Getopt.h"
00108 #include <libgen.h>
00109 #include <pthread.h>
00110 #include <stdlib.h>
00111 #include <string.h>

00113 #include <stdio.h>

00115 #ifdef HAVE_LIBREADLINE
00116 #include <readline/readline.h>
00117 #include <readline/history.h>

00119 
00120 #define NBTHRMAX 64
00121 
00122 time_t ServerBootTime = 0 ;
00123 
00124 typedef struct shell_info__
00125 {
00126   
00127   int shell_id;
00128   
00129   char prompt[32];
00130   char script_file[128];
00131   
00132   pthread_t       thread;  
00133   pthread_attr_t  attrs;
00134   
00135   int status;
00136   
00137 } shell_info_t;
00138 
00139 shell_info_t thrlist[NBTHRMAX];
00140 
00141 int verbose = 0;
00142 
00143 
00144 
00145 void * LaunchShell( void * arg )
00146 {
00147   int rc;
00148   
00149   shell_info_t * p_info = (shell_info_t *) arg ;
00150   
00151   rc = shell_Init( verbose, p_info->script_file, p_info->prompt, p_info->shell_id );
00152 
00153   if (rc)
00154   {
00155     fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Init\n",rc) ;
00156     p_info->status = rc;
00157     pthread_exit(&p_info->status);
00158   }
00159 
00160   rc = shell_Launch();
00161 
00162   if (rc)
00163   {
00164     fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Launch\n",rc) ;
00165     p_info->status = rc;
00166     pthread_exit(&p_info->status);
00167   }
00168 
00169   p_info->status = 0;
00170   
00171   /* never reached */
00172   return &p_info->status;
00173   
00174 }

00176 
00177 int main( int argc , char ** argv )
00178 {
00179   
00180   
00181   static char * format = "h@vn:";
00182   static char * help = "Usage: %s [-h][-v][-n <nb>][Script_File1 [Script_File2]...]\n";
00183   
00184   int option, rc;
00185   
00186   int err_flag = 0;
00187   int flag_h = 0;
00188   
00189   int nb_instance = 0;
00190   
00191   char * prompt = "ganeshell>";
00192   char * script_file = NULL;  
00193   
00194   char * progname = basename(argv[0]);
00195   
00196   
00197   int nb_threads = 0;
00198 
00199   /* Set the Boot time */
00200   ServerBootTime = time( NULL ) ;
00201   
00202   /* disables Getopt error message */
00203   Opterr = 0;
00204   
00205   /* reinits Getopt processing */
00206   Optind = 1;
00207   
00208   
00209 
00210   
00211   while ((option = Getopt(argc, argv, format)) != -1)
00212   {   
00213     switch(option)
00214     {
00215       case 'h':
00216         if (flag_h)
00217           fprintf(stderr,
00218               "%s: warning: option 'h' has been specified more than once.\n",progname );
00219         else flag_h ++;
00220         break;
00221 
00222       case '@':
00223           /* A litlle backdoor to keep track of binary versions */
00224           printf( "%s compiled on %s at %s\n", progname, __DATE__, __TIME__ ) ;
00225           printf( "Release = %s\n", VERSION ) ;
00226           printf( "Release comment = %s\n",VERSION_COMMENT ) ;
00227           exit( 0 ) ;
00228           break ;
00229 
00230       case 'n':
00231         if (nb_instance)
00232           fprintf(stderr,
00233               "%s: warning: option 'n' has been specified more than once.\n",progname );
00234         else
00235           nb_instance = atoi( Optarg );
00236               
00237         break;
00238         
00239       case 'v':
00240         if (verbose)
00241           fprintf(stderr,
00242               "%s: warning: option 'v' has been specified more than once.\n",progname );
00243         else verbose ++;
00244         break;
00245         
00246       case '?':
00247         fprintf(stderr,"%s: unknown option : %c\n",progname,Optopt);
00248         err_flag ++;
00249         break;
00250     }    
00251   }
00252 
00253   
00254   /* help flag */  
00255   if ( flag_h || err_flag )
00256   {
00257     fprintf( stderr, help, basename(progname) );
00258     exit(err_flag);
00259   }
00260 
00261 #ifdef HAVE_LIBREADLINE
00262   /* Initialize history */
00263   using_history();
00264 #endif
00265   
00266   /* case when the 'n' option is specified */
00267   if ( nb_instance != 0 )
00268   {
00269      int i;
00270     /* case when there two or more threads */  
00271     
00272     for ( i = 0 ; i < nb_instance; i++ )
00273     {      
00274       
00275       if (verbose)
00276         fprintf(stderr, "Starting thread %d using file %s...\n",
00277                 nb_threads, argv[Optind] );
00278       
00279       thrlist[nb_threads].shell_id = nb_threads;
00280       
00281       snprintf( thrlist[nb_threads].prompt, 32, "ganeshell-%d>", nb_threads );
00282       strncpy ( thrlist[nb_threads].script_file,argv[Optind], 128 );
00283       
00284       pthread_attr_init( &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs );
00285       pthread_attr_setscope(  &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs, PTHREAD_SCOPE_SYSTEM );
00286       
00287       nb_threads ++;
00288       
00289       if ( nb_threads >= NBTHRMAX )
00290       {
00291         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: Too much threads (%d > %d)\n",nb_threads, NBTHRMAX);
00292         exit(1);
00293       }
00294 
00295     }
00296     
00297     /* inits shell barriers */
00298     
00299     rc = shell_BarrierInit( nb_threads );
00300     
00301     if (rc)
00302     {
00303       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_BarrierInit\n",rc) ;
00304       exit(1);
00305     }
00306     
00307     /* launching threads */
00308     
00309     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00310     {
00311       rc = pthread_create(
00312           &thrlist[i].thread,
00313           &thrlist[i].attrs,
00314           LaunchShell ,
00315           &thrlist[i] );
00316 
00317       if (rc)
00318       {
00319         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in pthread_create\n",rc) ;
00320         exit(1);
00321       }
00322     
00323     }
00324     
00325     /* waiting for thread termination */
00326     
00327     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00328     {
00329       void * ret;
00330       pthread_join( thrlist[i].thread, &ret );
00331       
00332     }
00333     
00334     exit(0);
00335     
00336   }    
00337   /* case when there is only zero or one script file */
00338   else if ( Optind >= (argc-1) )
00339   {        
00340     
00341     if ( Optind == (argc-1) )
00342     {
00343       script_file = argv[Optind];
00344     }
00345     
00346     rc = shell_Init( verbose, script_file, prompt, 0 );
00347 
00348     if (rc)
00349     {
00350       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Init\n",rc) ;
00351       exit(1);
00352     }
00353 
00354     rc = shell_Launch();
00355 
00356     if (rc)
00357     {
00358       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_Launch\n",rc) ;
00359       exit(1);
00360     }
00361 
00362     exit(0);
00363     
00364   }
00365   else
00366   {
00367     int i;
00368     /* case when there two or more threads */  
00369     
00370     for ( i = Optind ; i < argc; i++ )
00371     {      
00372       
00373       if (verbose)
00374         fprintf(stderr, "Starting thread %d using file %s...\n",
00375                 nb_threads, argv[i] );
00376       
00377       thrlist[nb_threads].shell_id = nb_threads;
00378       
00379       snprintf( thrlist[nb_threads].prompt, 32, "ganeshell-%d>", nb_threads );
00380       strncpy ( thrlist[nb_threads].script_file,argv[i], 128 );
00381       
00382       pthread_attr_init( &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs );
00383       pthread_attr_setscope(  &thrlist[nb_threads].attrs, PTHREAD_SCOPE_SYSTEM );
00384       
00385       nb_threads ++;
00386       
00387       if ( nb_threads >= NBTHRMAX )
00388       {
00389         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: Too much threads (%d > %d)\n",nb_threads, NBTHRMAX);
00390         exit(1);
00391       }
00392 
00393     }
00394     
00395     /* inits shell barriers */
00396     
00397     rc = shell_BarrierInit( nb_threads );
00398     
00399     if (rc)
00400     {
00401       fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in shell_BarrierInit\n",rc) ;
00402       exit(1);
00403     }
00404     
00405     /* launching threads */
00406     
00407     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00408     {
00409       rc = pthread_create(
00410           &thrlist[i].thread,
00411           &thrlist[i].attrs,
00412           LaunchShell ,
00413           &thrlist[i] );
00414 
00415       if (rc)
00416       {
00417         fprintf(stderr, "GANESHELL: ERROR %d in pthread_create\n",rc) ;
00418         exit(1);
00419       }
00420     
00421     }
00422     
00423     /* waiting for thread termination */
00424     
00425     for ( i = 0; i < nb_threads; i++ )
00426     {
00427       void * ret;
00428       pthread_join( thrlist[i].thread, &ret );
00429       
00430     }
00431     
00432     exit(0);
00433     
00434   }
00435     
00436 }
